A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I made an account just to give my rating. I loooooved this movie so much. I have been floored by some of the negative reactions I have seen on here. I just couldn't let the haters get away with this! I am a lifelong SW fan and have never been more satisfied by a film in my life. Just keep an open mind\, let yourself get swept up in another fantastic adventure\, and I think you'll love it too.
